textBox.richText: So I have Oracle training in the city this week, and I can either take the E train all the way in or take the LIRR and THEN the E Train up to 53rd and 5th. Today I decided to take the LIRR and then the E up. First off, I couldn’t even get on the platform at Penn for the E. I had to wait to get TO the turnstile. Then the trains, which are packed like sardines, were insane. I don’t know how bloomberg thinks he’s going to be able to tax people to drive into midtown and force them to use public transportation
They Don’t call it a rat race for nothing....
